item.description: Hi, I’m Denis ğŸ’ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ’» Golang and Python developer who secretly love frontend but most of the time work as a backend developer at Lamoda. I have experience with microservices and event-driven architecture. Work in E-commerce on apps and website backend and 20+ microservices that provide discounts, catalog navigation, pricing, checkout, cart and other for our customers. Like to work in a small to medium teams and help understand business requirements, plan and document architecture, decompose tasks, code and get things done.
